00031 //
00032 // INIT
00033 //
00035 
00036 ZestMainWindow::ZestMainWindow(QWidget *parent)
00037 : QMainWindow(parent), _document(Document::getInstance()) {
00038 
00039     // register as an observer for app data
00040     _document->registerObserver(this);
00041 
00042     // setting up GUI
00043     ui.setupUi(this);
00044     ui.statusbar->setSizeGripEnabled(false);
00045 
00046     // update view
00047     updateView();
00048 
00049     // usefull to populate delay times with document updated values
00050     processTempoInput();
00051 
00052     // give focus to tempo input field
00053     setFocusToTempoInput();
00054 
00055     // say hello
00056     statusTempMessage("I'm ready, sir");
00057 
00058     // register as an event filter for tempo input field
00059     ui.tempoEdit->installEventFilter(this);
00060 }

00073 //
00074 // OBSERVER IMPLEMENTATION
00075 //
00077 void ZestMainWindow::updateView(void) {
00078 
00079     /*
00080      * we display delay frequencies as plain float number
00081      * ( no scientific format ) with only a precision of 3
00082      */
00083     static const int    LFO_DISPLAY_PRECISION = 3;
00084     static const char   LFO_DISPLAY_FORMAT = 'f';
00085 
00086     /*
00087      * pixmaps used for steadiness hint
00088      */
00089     static QPixmap      redHint(":/lights/pix/red_hint.png");
00090     static QPixmap      greenHint(":/lights/pix/green_hint.png");
00091 
00092     /*
00093      * constants used as stylesheets for steadyHint label
00094      */
00095     // update tempo input field with validated value
00096     ui.tempoEdit->setText(QString::number(_document->getTempo()));
00097 
00098     // update delay display fields
00099     ui.quarterPeriodEdit->setText(
00100             QString::number(qRound(_document->getQuarterDelay()->getPeriod())));
00101 
00102     ui.quarterLfoEdit->setText(
00103             QString::number(_document->getQuarterDelay()->getFrenquency(),
00104             LFO_DISPLAY_FORMAT,
00105             LFO_DISPLAY_PRECISION));
00106 
00107     ui.wholePeriodEdit->setText(
00108             QString::number(qRound(_document->getWholeDelay()->getPeriod())));
00109 
00110     ui.wholeLfoEdit->setText(
00111             QString::number(_document->getWholeDelay()->getFrenquency(),
00112             LFO_DISPLAY_FORMAT,
00113             LFO_DISPLAY_PRECISION));
00114 
00115     ui.halfPeriodEdit->setText(
00116             QString::number(qRound(_document->getHalfDelay()->getPeriod())));
00117 
00118     ui.halfLfoEdit->setText(
00119             QString::number(_document->getHalfDelay()->getFrenquency(),
00120             LFO_DISPLAY_FORMAT,
00121             LFO_DISPLAY_PRECISION));
00122 
00123     ui.eighthPeriodEdit->setText(
00124             QString::number(qRound(_document->getEighthDelay()->getPeriod())));
00125 
00126     ui.eighthLfoEdit->setText(
00127             QString::number(_document->getEighthDelay()->getFrenquency(),
00128             LFO_DISPLAY_FORMAT,
00129             LFO_DISPLAY_PRECISION));
00130 
00131     ui.sixteenthPeriodEdit->setText(
00132             QString::number(qRound(_document->getSixTeenthDelay()->getPeriod())));
00133 
00134     ui.sixteenthLfoEdit->setText(
00135             QString::number(_document->getSixTeenthDelay()->getFrenquency(),
00136             LFO_DISPLAY_FORMAT,
00137             LFO_DISPLAY_PRECISION));
00138 
00139     ui.thirtySecondPeriodEdit->setText(
00140             QString::number(qRound(_document->getThirtySecondDelay()->getPeriod())));
00141 
00142     ui.thirtySecondLfoEdit->setText(
00143             QString::number(_document->getThirtySecondDelay()->getFrenquency(),
00144             LFO_DISPLAY_FORMAT,
00145             LFO_DISPLAY_PRECISION));
00146 
00147     // give a light and statusbar message according to steadiness
00148     if ( _document->isTempoFromTap() ) {
00149 
00150         if ( _document->isSteady() ) {
00151 
00152             statusPermMessage("You're steady");
00153             ui.steadyHint->setPixmap(greenHint);
00154 
00155         } else {
00156 
00157             statusPermMessage("Keep tapping...");
00158             ui.steadyHint->setPixmap(redHint);
00159         }
00160 
00161     } else {
00162 
00163         statusPermMessage("");
00164         ui.steadyHint->setPixmap(NULL);
00165     }
00166 }

00176 void ZestMainWindow::on_tempoEdit_returnPressed() {
00177 
00178     processTempoInput();
00179 
00180     // set focus to tempo input field
00181     setFocusToTempoInput();
00182 }

00241 //
00242 // EVENT HANDLERS
00243 //
00245 bool ZestMainWindow::eventFilter(QObject* target, QEvent* event) {
00246 
00247     // handling of mousewheel events onto temo input field
00248     if ( target == ui.tempoEdit && event->type() == QEvent::Wheel ) {
00249 
00250         QWheelEvent* wheelEvent = static_cast<QWheelEvent*>(event);
00251 
00252         // most mice work in steps of 15 degrees
00253         int numDegrees = wheelEvent->delta() / 8;
00254         int numSteps = numDegrees / 15;
00255 
00256         double tempo = ui.tempoEdit->text().toDouble();
00257 
00258         ui.tempoEdit->setText(QString::number(tempo + numSteps));
00259 
00260         // do the math !!
00261         processTempoInput();
00262 
00263         return true;
00264 
00265     } else {
00266 
00267         return QMainWindow::eventFilter(target, event);
00268     }
00269 }

00275 //
00276 // PRIVATE FUNCTIONS
00277 //
00279 void ZestMainWindow::setFocusToTempoInput(void) const {
00280 
00281     ui.tempoEdit->setFocus();
00282     ui.tempoEdit->selectAll();
00283 }
00284 
00285 
00286 
00287 
00288 void ZestMainWindow::processTempoInput(void) const {
00289 
00290     // tempo has been entered numerically
00291     _document->setTempoFromTap(false);
00292 
00293     // get tempo input field content and pass it to document
00294     _document->setTempo(ui.tempoEdit->text().toDouble());
00295 }

00300 void ZestMainWindow::statusPermMessage(const QString& message) const {
00301 
00302     ui.statusbar->showMessage(message);
00303 }
00304 
00305

00307 
00308 void ZestMainWindow::statusTempMessage(const QString& message) const {
00309 
00310     // temp messages are shown for 1.5 seconds
00311     static const int STATUSBAR_TEMP_TIMEOUT = 1500;
00312 
00313     ui.statusbar->showMessage(message, STATUSBAR_TEMP_TIMEOUT);
00314 }
